did.head: Descriptive Summary

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: Account book from England with entries for various railroad companies, docks, and other transportation-related companies. Individuals are also represented.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Account Book, Crerar Ms 273, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: This is an account book from England that spans the years 1832 to 1835. Many of the accounts are for various railroad companies, docks, and other transportation-related companies. Individuals are also represented. The account book was transferred from the Carry Collection. A piece of paper at the front of the book notes that it was “probably the gift of Mrs. E.F. Carry 6/30/1931,” and it is plated with Edward Francis Carry’s plate.
